description: Akrai, an ancient city of Sicily, originated as a colony founded by Syracuse in 664 B.C., making it the first of the city's three colonial foundations.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: near Palazzolo Acreide

properties.description: Representative point location of the archaeological area near Palazzolo Acreide based on OpenStreetMap.
